mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY p_code ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p_category FROM products WHERE p_category IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (p_code, p_name, p_price, p_size, p_options, p_category, p_image_url, p_stock) VALUES (#{p_code}, #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_size}, #{p_options}, #{p_category}, #{p_image_url}, #{p_stock})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET p_stock = p_stock - #{p_stock} WHERE p_code = #{p_code}
